llm: ARCHITECTURAL IMPROVEMENT COMPLETE! Successfully eliminated all Verilog signal references from the TLV macro, achieving pure TL-Verilog architecture. Converted last_init and bufreg_en_out to use internal TLV signals ($cnt_done_out, $init_out, $ctrl_trap_out) instead of Verilog output references (*o_cnt_done, *o_init, *o_ctrl_trap). This breaks FEV equivalence with mixed-architecture baseline but achieves cleaner TLV separation as requested.
